TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner

Docs.summary: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件表示业务对象的方法调用以便执行 Delete、 Insert、 Select、 和更新数据库操作的数据源。
在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>类提供设计时支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>可视设计器中的控件。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>类成员提供以下功能：
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>属性指示是否可以显示配置数据源向导。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>属性指示是否关联的架构<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件可以在设计时刷新。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>属性指定执行 Select 函数的方法。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A>属性指定为关联的控件提供数据的业务对象的类型。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>方法返回具有指定名称的数据源视图。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>方法返回的关联的数据源视图名称的列表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>方法从关联的业务对象中提取选择方法的元数据。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>方法使显示在可视化设计器图面上配置数据源向导。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法中删除从属性、 添加其他属性，或隐藏关联控件的属性。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>类更改的外观和行为的派生自的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件在设计时。
该示例从`MyObjectDataSource`控件从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>。 `MyObjectDataSource`是一份<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。 该示例还从`MyObjectDataSourceDesigner`类<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>，并将应用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>属性，则为`MyObjectDataSourceDesigner`上`MyObjectDataSource`控件。
`MyObjectDataSourceDesigner`重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法来执行<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>属性显示在**属性**网格在设计时。
`MyObjectDataSourceDesigner`重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法以显示<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>属性中的占位符，除了控件类型和 id。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner/CS/ObjectDataSourceDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner/VB/ObjectDataSourceDesigner.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>类时创建关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件或该控件在可视化设计器图面上的副本。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanConfigure As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanConfigure { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called.
Docs.value: 如果可以调用方法;否则为。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>可以调用方法，与<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>属性是`true`，如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>属性关联的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService>接口。
如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>是`true`、**配置数据源**菜单项显示在**常见 ObjectDataSource 任务**可视化设计器上的关联控件的上下文菜单图面。 选择此菜单项时，将调用配置数据源向导。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanRefreshSchema As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanRefreshSchema { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called.
Docs.value: 如果可调用; 否则为。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>可以调用方法，与<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>属性是`true`，如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>属性关联的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService>接口，并且<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性都包含一个值。
如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>是`true`、**刷新架构**菜单项显示在**常见 ObjectDataSource 任务**可视化设计器图面上的关联控件的上下文菜单。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Configure() cil managed

Docs.summary: Displays the Configure Data Source wizard on the visual designer surface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>方法开始在可视化设计器图面将使配置数据源向导出现一个事务。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>当选中调用方法**配置数据源**上的菜单项**常见 ObjectDataSource 任务**关联的上下文菜单<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。 **配置数据源**菜单项显示在上下文菜单时<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>属性是`true`。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView GetView(string viewName) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetView (viewName As String) As DesignerDataSourceView

Docs.param: A string containing the name of the .
Docs.summary: Returns a data source view with the specified name.
Docs.returns: An with the name specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>具有指定名称的对象。 如果`viewName`是`null`或空字符串 ("")，返回的名称数组中的第一个视图名称<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>用作指定的名称。 如果不返回任何视图名称<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>生成一个未命名<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string[] GetViewNames() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetViewNames () As String()

Docs.summary: Returns a list of data source view names for the associated control.
Docs.returns: A string array containing the names of the objects of the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>方法视图中获取名称的架构名称的关联控件的数据表。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

Docs.param: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.
Docs.summary: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自的方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法隐藏各种控件属性，用相应的设计时属性设计器实现，并将添加到属性或删除属性从**属性**网格。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法创建设计时属性，以隐藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>的关联属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制，以便它们显示在**属性**的可视化设计器的网格。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>继承自的类方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>类更改**属性**网格控件派生自的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>类在设计时间。 示例使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>属性显示在**属性**网格。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner/CS/ObjectDataSourceDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner/VB/ObjectDataSourceDesigner.vb#4)]

block.para: 重写方法可以将属性添加到或更改的设计时属性集合中的属性的属性。一定要调用基方法，然后再执行其他处理。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void RefreshSchema(bool preferSilent) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub RefreshSchema (preferSilent As Boolean)

Docs.param: If , does not display error messages when exceptions occur during processing; otherwise, exception messages are displayed.
Docs.summary: Extracts the metadata for the Select method from the business object that is specified by the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>方法提取命名方法的元数据<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>属性从<xref:System.Type>命名的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A>属性，它是提供的数据的业务对象的类型关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。 元数据保存在<xref:System.Data.DataTable>数组并在<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A>设计器的数组。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SelectMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SelectMethod : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the method to execute when the method of the associated control is called.
Docs.value: 包含方法时要执行的名称的字符串调用。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>属性阴影<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>关联控件的属性。
时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>属性更改，关联的设计时标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>更新控件。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>调用方法时，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>属性为 true; 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>引发事件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TypeName : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the type that contains the methods that are specified in the associated control.
Docs.value: 包含包含执行删除的方法的类型的名称的字符串，插入、 选择和更新数据库操作中关联指定。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A>属性阴影<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>关联控件的属性。
时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A>属性更改，关联的设计时标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>更新控件。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>调用方法时，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>属性为 true; 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>引发事件。
